name: Achref SOUA
summary: Versatile AI engineer with experience in generative AI, NLP, time series, and computer vision. Skilled across the full project lifecycle from prototype to deployment, with strong interest in impactful, production-ready systems.

experience.summary: Working on medical image segmentation for aortic applications, mesh generation and geometric calculations for surgical planning and modelling. Collaborating closely with clinicians to productionize robust image-to-mesh pipelines.
Built a FinOps multi-agent assistant with LangGraph. Improved long-term memory for multi-turn financial dialogues and deployed services on AWS using Lambda, S3 and Bedrock with CI/CD.

experience.company: Intellect Core Advisory and Solutions SARL
experience.summary: Developed LLM-based solutions and RAG architectures using LangChain. Orchestrated enterprise chatbot deployments on AWS (Lambda, Bedrock).

Designed an embedded gait analysis system using Arduino Nano 33 and IMU sensors. Used denoising autoencoders and deep learning (GRU, LSTM, Transformers) for knee-angle prediction, improving prediction quality by ~20%. Optimized hyperparameters with Optuna and tracked experiments with Weights & Biases.

education.institution: École Supérieure Privée d'Ingénierie et de Technologies (ESPRIT)
education.degree: Engineering Degree in Computer Science, AI

publications.citation: Soua, A., Charfi, B., & Riahi, M. H. (2024). Improved Bionic Leg with AI.
publications.venue: 10th Int. Conf. on Green Energy & Environmental Engineering (GEEE-2024)
